prompt: Re-write this music caption in three different styles. You can mix the order of the instruments.
inputs: This song includes Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Piano, Synth Pad, but without Drums.
captions:
Style 1:
Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Piano, and Synth Pad are the instruments featured in this song, but Drums are absent.

Style 2:
This song is composed of Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Piano, and Synth Pad, with no Drums.

Style 3:
This composition is comprised of Guitar, Synth Lead, Bass, Piano, and Synth Pad, omitting Drums.
